data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Chikmagalur against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chikmagalur, Karnataka, India

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Chikmagalur, Karnataka, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Chikmagalur, Karnataka, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Chikmagalur.
Lord, please remember the Maniyani people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, help the 12,518 believers in Chikmagalur to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,125,482 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,138,000 souls in Chikmagalur and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chikmagalur, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,138,000.

We estimate Chikmagalur has 12,518 people who might know Jesus, 13,808 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,111,674 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Chikmagalur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
